Simulation.NetToComp¶

Use the triangle class to represent triangles.

Bases: object

Beispielkommentar

getCommentsFromNetlist(netListFile)[source]¶

Create a triangle with sides of lengths a, b, and c.

Raises ValueError if the three length values provided cannot actually form a triangle.
